import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Alert from 'react-bootstrap/Alert'; function TaskItem(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [value, setValue] = useState({title: props.task.title, comments: props.task.body}); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const onSubmit = () => { console.log(value.title); console.log(value.comments); handleClose(); } return (
{props.task.title} {props.task.state}

{props.task.body}

Edit Task
Title {setValue({title: e.target.value, comment: value.comments})}} /> Comments {setValue({title: value.title, comments: e.target.value})}} />
) } export default TaskItem
